Class GameOverManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.controller.core.GameOverManager
public class GameOverManager extends Object
Manages all game over logic including overlay visibility, opacity transitions, curtain animations, and post-game-over confirmation dialogs.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameOverManager

      public GameOverManager(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane gameOverOverlay, javafx.scene.layout.HBox mainContent, javafx.scene.layout.Pane curtainLeft, javafx.scene.layout.Pane curtainRight, javafx.scene.control.Button pauseButton, GameTimer gameTimer, AnimationHandler animationHandler)
      Creates a new GameOverManager.
      Parameters:
      gameOverOverlay - the overlay containing the game over screen
      mainContent - the main content pane to adjust opacity
      curtainLeft - the left curtain for transitions
      curtainRight - the right curtain for transitions
      pauseButton - the pause button to disable
      gameTimer - the game timer to stop
      animationHandler - the animation handler to notify

  • Method Details

    • setOnShowConfirmationDialog

      public void setOnShowConfirmationDialog(Runnable onShowConfirmationDialog)
      Sets the callback to invoke when the confirmation dialog should be shown after the game over overlay has been displayed.
      Parameters:
      onShowConfirmationDialog - callback to show the confirmation dialog

    • showGameOver

      public void showGameOver()
      Initiates the game over sequence: 1. Notifies the animation handler 2. Stops music and plays game over sound 3. Stops the game timer 4. Disables the pause button 5. Shows the game over overlay 6. Reduces main content opacity 7. After a delay, hides the overlay and shows confirmation dialog

    • showOverlay

      private void showOverlay()
      Shows the game over overlay.

    • hideOverlay

      public void hideOverlay()
      Hides the game over overlay.

    • setMainContentOpacity

      private void setMainContentOpacity(double opacity)
      Sets the opacity of the main content.
      Parameters:
      opacity - the opacity value (0.0 to 1.0)

    • resetMainContentOpacity

      public void resetMainContentOpacity()
      Resets the main content opacity to fully opaque.

    • resetCurtainPositions

      public void resetCurtainPositions()
      Resets the curtain positions to their off-screen positions.

    • scheduleConfirmationDialog

      private void scheduleConfirmationDialog()
      Schedules the confirmation dialog to appear after a 3-second delay. This also hides the game over overlay and resets the main content opacity.

    • isGameOverVisible

      public boolean isGameOverVisible()
      Checks if the game over overlay is currently visible.
      Returns:
      true if the overlay is visible, false otherwise
